alert.note: Alert for Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 15 at 2:08PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Yavapai County through 245 PM MST... At 206 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles northwest of Sycamore Creek to 8 miles west of Horseshoe Reservoir to near Lake Pleasant to near White Tank Mountain Park. Movement was north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cordes Junction, Bumble Bee, Cordes Lakes, Lake Pleasant, Black Canyon City, Castle Hot Springs, Wagoner, Cordes, Horseshoe Reservoir, Spring Valley, Crown King, Rock Springs, Mayer, Hazlett Hollow Campground and Turney Gulch Group Campground. This includes the following highways... Interstate 17 between mile markers 242 and 273. State Route 69 between mile markers 263 and 271. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
